programme.title: The Transporter Refueled
programme.desc: When former mercenary-turned-contract driver Frank Martin ishired by a mysterious woman for a job, he finds himself embroiled in a dangerous game, since the woman has her own vendetta that she wants to settle with a Russian mobster.

programme.title: Action Zone
programme.desc: A program that offers a look at the latest films that arepremiering in international theaters, and the film scenes that baffled audiences, in addition to many exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Den of Thieves
programme.desc: While planning a bank robbery, a thief is surrounded by twogroups of dangerous criminals.

programme.title: Faster
programme.desc: Driver (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson) seeks revenge againstthose who put him in prison as well as those who killed his brother. After 10 years, he is released from prison, drives through the deserts of Nevada in search of his enemies while being chased by a contract killer (Oliver Jackson-Cohen) and a veteran cop (Billy Bob Thornton).

programme.title: Dark Shadows
programme.desc: When Barnabas slights Angelique and breaks her heart, hediscovers that hell truly hath no fury like a woman scorned. Angelique, a witch, takes her revenge by burying him alive after cursing him with vampirism. When he is finally freed centuries later, he emerges to a whole new world.

programme.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
programme.desc: The story of Gustave H (Ralph Fiennes) the legendaryconcerige at a famous Hotel ,who befriends the lobby boy Zero Mustafa (Tony Revolori). When Madame D. (Tilda Swinton) is killed , her son Dmitry (Adrien Brody) decides to take revenge on Gustave, while everyone is after a priceless painting.

programme.title: Moonrise Kingdom
programme.desc: Set in the sixties, in an island in New England, a12-year-old boy and girl fall in love and secretly plan to run away together. This angers the authorities in the island, and the situation escalates to the point where they attempt to track the young couple in all directions.

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: When he is whisked away from his dull London orphanage,life, the twelve-year-old Peter finds himself in the magical Neverland, where fun is just another word for danger and vice versa. Many adventures send Peter exploring more about himself and his world, eventually becoming an immortal hero.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: After (Spider-Man) gets the key to the city for saving themayor's life and the city as a whole, he becomes vain and his relationship with (Mary Jane) is strained. He then encounters a parasitic creature from outer space who has the ability to create an evil aggressive spirit.

programme.title: Den of Thieves
programme.desc: While planning a bank robbery, a thief is surrounded by twogroups of dangerous criminals.

programme.title: Rescue Dawn
programme.desc: A German/American plane goes out on a secret mission, butcrashes in a forest during the Laos bombing of 1965. The plane's crew are taken as hostages and tortured by Vietcong forces. US Navy Pilot successfully plans an escape method for the hostages, but they face plenty of unforeseen events.

programme.title: The Good German
programme.desc: When an American war correspondent arrives in post-warBerlin to report on a conference, he is drawn into a murder investigation and an attempt to help his former sweetheart escape Germany which uncovers a larger government conspiracy.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: This thriller recounts how the U.S. container ship, theMaersk Alabama, headed by Captain Richard Phillips (Tom Hanks), became the first American ship to be hijacked in two hundred years when they come head to head with Somali pirates.

programme.title: 12 Strong
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the film tells the story of a SpecialForces team that was sent to Afghanistan right after the 9/11 attacks. Deep into enemy territory, the team faces unfavorable odds and make uneasy alliances as they try to take down the Taliban.

programme.title: Rogue
programme.desc: As Samantha O'Hara leads a team of mercenaries on a missionto rescue hostages in remote Africa, the mission goes haywire and the team becomes hunted by a group of rebels and wild lions.

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Frank Martin finds himself tasked with transporting theEnvironmental Agency Minister's daughter under dangerous circumstances.

programme.title: The Transporter Refueled
programme.desc: When former mercenary-turned-contract driver Frank Martin ishired by a mysterious woman for a job, he finds himself embroiled in a dangerous game, since the woman has her own vendetta that she wants to settle with a Russian mobster.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: Based in Mexico, ex-FBI agent John Creasy is hired toprotect nine-year-old Pita Ramos, who gets kidnapped. Creasy swears to stop at nothing to get revenge from her kidnappers.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: This thriller recounts how the U.S. container ship, theMaersk Alabama, headed by Captain Richard Phillips (Tom Hanks), became the first American ship to be hijacked in two hundred years when they come head to head with Somali pirates.

programme.title: The Good German
programme.desc: When an American war correspondent arrives in post-warBerlin to report on a conference, he is drawn into a murder investigation and an attempt to help his former sweetheart escape Germany which uncovers a larger government conspiracy.

programme.title: 12 Strong
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the film tells the story of a SpecialForces team that was sent to Afghanistan right after the 9/11 attacks. Deep into enemy territory, the team faces unfavorable odds and make uneasy alliances as they try to take down the Taliban.

programme.title: The Debt Collector
programme.desc: Looking for a job in America, a British martial artist landsone as a mob debt collector, but when a job goes south, he gets dragged into trouble, fighting to find his way out of it while questioning the rightness of what he's doing.

programme.title: Debt Collectors
programme.desc: The debt collectors, French and Sue, find themselves facingall kinds of trouble, when they do a job in Las Vegas that leads them to chasing down a dirty casino owner while evading a vengeful drug kingpin.

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: On the eve of the fall of the Berlin wall, spy LorraineBroughton goes on a mission to bring down the spy network that killed an undercover agent for an unknown reason.

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: An elite hitman is successful working in the shadows. Nowhe's teaching his trade to an apprentice who is related to one of his previous victims.

programme.title: Mile 22
programme.desc: Assigned to Indonesia, a top notch intelligence officer,backed up by top-secret tactical command unit, is commissioned to smuggle a police officer out of the country, as he has some sensitive and classified information.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: This thriller recounts how the U.S. container ship, theMaersk Alabama, headed by Captain Richard Phillips (Tom Hanks), became the first American ship to be hijacked in two hundred years when they come head to head with Somali pirates.

programme.title: Rogue
programme.desc: As Samantha O'Hara leads a team of mercenaries on a missionto rescue hostages in remote Africa, the mission goes haywire and the team becomes hunted by a group of rebels and wild lions.

programme.title: Faster
programme.desc: Driver (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson) seeks revenge againstthose who put him in prison as well as those who killed his brother. After 10 years, he is released from prison, drives through the deserts of Nevada in search of his enemies while being chased by a contract killer (Oliver Jackson-Cohen) and a veteran cop (Billy Bob Thornton).

programme.title: Space Jam: A New Legacy
programme.desc: After NBA superstar LeBron James finds himself trapped withhis son in a virtual space, he must join forces with Bugs Bunny and the rest of the Looney Tunes gang to win a fateful basketball game against the Goon Squad and get back home with his son.

programme.title: Julie & Julia
programme.desc: Based on true events, the film juxtaposes the journey ofrenowned chef Julia Child and how she achieved her fame, and the story of an ordinary woman, Julie Powell, who tries to reinvent her life by documenting her year-long challenge to cook all the available recipes in Julia Child’s cookbook.

programme.title: Long Shot
programme.desc: When Fred Flarsky reunites with his high school crush,Charlotte Field, now one of the most influential women in the world, a new spark is born between them. She hires him to write her speeches, as she prepares to run for US presidency.

programme.title: I Used to Go Here
programme.desc: Right after her new novel is published, the 35-year-old Kateis invited by her professor to speak at her alma matter, but little did Kate know that her journey will get her involved with a group of college students.

programme.title: Alice, Darling
programme.desc: As Alice is pushed to the edge by her abusive boyfriend, sheembarks on a journey of self-discovery as she goes on vacation with her two best friends.

programme.title: Action Zone
programme.desc: A program that offers a look at the latest films that arepremiering in international theaters, and the film scenes that baffled audiences, in addition to many exclusive interviews.

programme.title: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It
programme.desc: When a murder takes place, two top paranormal investigators,Ed and Lorraine, scrumble to figure out the truth of a murderer claiming to be possessed by a demon.

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: On the occasion of his fifth wedding anniversary, Nick Dunnereports that his wife, Amy, has gone missing. Under pressure from the police and a growing media frenzy, Nick's portrait of a blissful union begins to crumble. Soon his lies, deceits and strange behavior have everyone asking the same dark question: Did Nick Dunne kill his wife?

programme.title: Julie & Julia
programme.desc: Based on true events, the film juxtaposes the journey ofrenowned chef Julia Child and how she achieved her fame, and the story of an ordinary woman, Julie Powell, who tries to reinvent her life by documenting her year-long challenge to cook all the available recipes in Julia Child’s cookbook.

programme.title: Space Jam: A New Legacy
programme.desc: After NBA superstar LeBron James finds himself trapped withhis son in a virtual space, he must join forces with Bugs Bunny and the rest of the Looney Tunes gang to win a fateful basketball game against the Goon Squad and get back home with his son.

programme.title: I Used to Go Here
programme.desc: Right after her new novel is published, the 35-year-old Kateis invited by her professor to speak at her alma matter, but little did Kate know that her journey will get her involved with a group of college students.

programme.title: Long Shot
programme.desc: When Fred Flarsky reunites with his high school crush,Charlotte Field, now one of the most influential women in the world, a new spark is born between them. She hires him to write her speeches, as she prepares to run for US presidency.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: Having lost his mother as a child when a vampire killed her,Blade, a half-vampire, half-mortal, takes matters into his own hands as he vows to slay wicked vampires to protect human beings.

programme.title: Freaks
programme.desc: After being confined to living in an abandoned house withher father for fear of being killed, seven-year-old Chloe comes outside only to discover that she possess abnormal power, which puts her life in danger.

programme.title: Battle: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The US marines face off against alien creatures who areattempting an invasion of the city of LA.

programme.title: Mortal Kombat
programme.desc: When a young hero gets embroiled in a brutal,multi-dimensional battle, the experience gives him a new perspective on his limits and capabilities.

programme.title: Underworld: Rise of the Lycans
programme.desc: In continuation of the first two parts of the same series,bloody events unfold between bloodsucking vampires and their slaves, the Lycans. The Lycans are led by Lucian, who wants to destroy the vampires' leader, whose daughter is in love with Lucian. She joins in the bloody wars with her lover against her father.

programme.title: Space Jam: A New Legacy
programme.desc: After NBA superstar LeBron James finds himself trapped withhis son in a virtual space, he must join forces with Bugs Bunny and the rest of the Looney Tunes gang to win a fateful basketball game against the Goon Squad and get back home with his son.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: When Smurfette is kidnapped by the evil wizard Gargamel, herlittle blue cohorts rally their human friends to help rescue her. And the stakes are high, as she has discovered a secret spell that can turn Gargamel's newest creation, creatures called the Naughties, into real Smurfs.

programme.title: Mirrors
programme.desc: A New York detective takes over night duty to secure a storethat has been shut down due to a large fire. He is exposed to strange happenings during the night. His wife is affected as well, and it becomes his duty to protect her and their son.

programme.title: I Used to Go Here
programme.desc: Right after her new novel is published, the 35-year-old Kateis invited by her professor to speak at her alma matter, but little did Kate know that her journey will get her involved with a group of college students.

programme.title: Freaks
programme.desc: After being confined to living in an abandoned house withher father for fear of being killed, seven-year-old Chloe comes outside only to discover that she possess abnormal power, which puts her life in danger.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Po panda finds himself chosen to fight the enemies, despitethe fact that he is obese and fairly lazy. He tries to prove himself in front of Master Shifu and the legendary Furious Five.

programme.title: Battle: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The US marines face off against alien creatures who areattempting an invasion of the city of LA.

programme.title: Hugo
programme.desc: In 1930's Paris, orphaned Hugo lives in a crowded trainstation. He enters a new adventure with Isabelle, in an attempt to solve the mystery his father has left behind regarding an automaton.

programme.title: Jack the Giant Slayer
programme.desc: An ancient war is reignited when a young farmhand, Jack,unwittingly opens a gateway between our world and that of a fearsome race of giants. Jack fights for a kingdom, its people, and the love of a princess.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Raised as soldiers in Ice Queen Freya's army, Eric and Sara,a fellow warrior, attempt to hide their forbidden love while they battle to survive Freya and her sister Ravenna's evil plans.

programme.title: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
programme.desc: The story of young King Arthur who succeeded in drawing thepowerful sword of Excalibur from the rock where it is lodged. He has to control his sword and unite the people under one front in order to defeat the tyrannical Vortigern, who had killed his parents and seized his throne in the past.

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: This action epic brings to life the real tale of 47 samuraiwarriors who in 18th century Japan set out on a quest to avenge the death of their master, killed by a treacherous overlord who banished them from their homeland.

programme.desc: After being confined to living in an abandoned house withher father for fear of being killed, seven-year-old Chloe comes outside only to discover that she possess abnormal power, which puts her life in danger.

programme.title: Mortal Kombat
